name: Aram Asatryan
description: '''Aram Hapeti Asatryan''' ({{langx|hy|Արամ Հապետի Ասատրյան}}; 3 March 1953 – 7 November 2006) was an [[Armenia]]n singer and songwriter of [[Music of Armenia#Pop music|Armenian pop]] and [[Rabiz (music genre)|rabiz]] music, known for his energetic concerts. He is widely regarded as the pioneer of the "rabiz" music genre and to this day remains the most popular rabiz singer of all time.
